# templates - General Documentation

## Overview

This directory contains resources for the templates component.

## Directory Structure

- **analysis/**: Subdirectory
- **core/**: Subdirectory
- **documentation/**: Subdirectory
- **policy/**: Subdirectory
- **process/**: Subdirectory
- **project/**: Subdirectory
- **README-template.md**: Readme Template documentation/resource.
- **audit_template.md**: Audit Template documentation/resource.
- **charter_template.md**: Charter Template documentation/resource.
- **committee_template.md**: Committee Template documentation/resource.

- **feedback-template.md**: Feedback Template documentation/resource.

- **guide-template.md**: Guide Template documentation/resource.
- **incident-template.md**: Incident Template documentation/resource.
- **incident_response_template.md**: Incident Response Template documentation/resource.
- **integration_template.md**: Integration Template documentation/resource.
- **meeting-notes-template.md**: Meeting Notes Template documentation/resource.
- **meeting-template.md**: Meeting Template documentation/resource.
- **policy-template.md**: Policy Template documentation/resource.

- **procedure_template.md**: Procedure Template documentation/resource.

- **status-report-template.md**: Status Report Template documentation/resource.

- **unit_documentation_template.md**: Unit Documentation Template documentation/resource.

- **workflow-template.md**: Workflow Template documentation/resource.
